name: intermission
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C ] mainly US (UK usually interval) a short period between the parts of a play, film, concert, etc.
[ U ] US a period between parts of a game when the players rest and people watching can leave their seats: The Sonics led by only two points at intermission.
